alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:32PM AKST until December 27 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches. West winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Brief whiteout conditions are possible. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan for difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. Brief whiteout conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds and the lowest visibilities expected from this evening through Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
